contents.translated: Flygon is nicknamed “the elemental spirit of the desert.” because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand,  this pokémon is at each moment enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
contents.text: FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental  spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.
